function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in visits to national parks across Europe","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission due to crowding and interactions between visitors","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing measures, limit visitor capacity, and implement frequent disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Digital visitor management systems, contactless payment systems, and disinfection robots","People":"Visitors, park staff, and local residents near the parks","Owner":"Park management and local government authorities"},{"Description":"Surge in visitors to country parks in Hong Kong","Impact":"Higher risk of disease spread due to crowding and close interactions in parks","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing measures, restrict park capacity, and implement rigorous cleaning and disinfection routines","Technologies":"Mobile apps for park capacity monitoring, contactless entry systems, and autonomous cleaning robots","People":"Park visitors, park staff, and local residents near the parks","Owner":"Park management and local government authorities"},{"Description":"Interviews with managers of urban green spaces in Latin American cities","Impact":"Potential for the spread of COVID-19 through in-person interviews and focus groups","Mitigation":"Conduct interviews virtually, ensure strict adherence to public health guidelines during in-person interactions, and provide regular testing for interview participants","Technologies":"Video conferencing platforms, health screening tools, and rapid COVID-19 test kits","People":"Managers, staff members, and interview participants in Latin American cities","Owner":"Research team and local government authorities"}]}
